segment.text: Welcome to DriftWood. If you didn't know, this is the largest village in the kingdom.
Currently, the passages to the swamplands, rock caverns, and ethereal badlands are fully up and functional.
However,the tunnel to the ice and lava caverns is currently under maintenance.
Well,they have been under maintenance for several years now.
The construction crew that was tasked with repairing them forgot to take out some barricades.
The crew went on to do some work in the other operational locations, but I never heard from them again.
If you need to get through, you'll have to go find those keys to remove the barricades.
You'd be doing me a huge favor by doing so. Take this key to access the currently-functional locations.
